TopicTitle: Kerbal figure sculpt - work in progress

Articles.Content:
I started this guy the day before 0.17 was released. I'm figuring some things out as I go, which makes it slow going - not to mention work/overtime, family, and other projects taking priority. Here's the album:

http://imgur.com/a/dHyuh

The plan is to have multiple faces and posed limbs, cast in resin, combined, and painted to make several Kerbal figures. Remaining obstacles are: making the clear visors, finishing the interlocking helmet rings, sculpting the master helmet and EVA pack, and making molds of everything! Then I'll have Kerbal 'kits', basically, that will need to be assembled and painted. Lots more work to go...
Sweet cant wait to see it done
OMG this is awesome, I need to do something like this.
*shivers* That should be a Halloween costume, the way the face is.

1. That is incredibly awesome!

2. It is staring into my very soul.
for some reason i want to bite it
Is it okay to necro this because of the database reset?
Fine by me. Updates soon, but I'll start a new thread...

2. It is staring into my very soul.

Impossible. Kerbals are cross-eyed, which also explains why they're so horrible at everything.
